ADVENTURE_OF_A_LIFETIME: You are about to embark on the adventure of a lifetime.

NAME: Name
NO_HITCHES: To make sure there aren't any hitches, we need to collect some information and we need you to read and understand some documents.
PACKING_LIST_HEADER:
# Packing List

The list below has your essentials for your next big outdoor adventure.

Pack like a pro and bring only what is on the list.

The list below has more info to help guide you in buying the right gear.

You can get everything on this list from **Decathlon** stores or online from **Taobao**.

Please note that you will be outdoors for most of this trip and everything you bring might get dirty ☺
PACKING_LIST_HEADER_OPTIONAL:
# Optional Items

Think twice before packing the items in the following list, they may have their use in the trip but there could be a better option, probably one of the items on the list above.
PACKING_LIST_HEADER_DO_NOT_BRING:
# What NOT to Bring

Part of being a pro adventurer means you know what comes with you on a trip and what stays at home.

Keep your pack light and do not bring the things listed below. You will thank yourself later!
PACKING_LIST_FOOTER:
## Recommended Retailers

- Decathlon | stores located in most major Chinese cities (迪卡侬)
- Jingdong | online (京东)
- Taobao | online (淘宝)
- T-Mall | online (天猫)

## Recommended Brands, Domestic

- Kailas | backpacks, camping gear, outwear, shoes, boots, apparel
- Mobi Garden | tents, sleeping bags, sleeping pads
- Nature Hike | camp kitchen
- Quechua (Decathlon brand) | backpacks, outdoor gear, jackets, clothes, shoes, outerwear
- Tribord (Decathlon brand) | water sports

## Recommended Brands, International (optional)

- Granite Gear | backpacks
- Gregory | backpacks
- Karrimor | hiking boots
- Keen | footwear
- Mammut | backpacks, outerwear
- Marmot | jackets, outerwear
- North Face | backpacks, jackets, clothes, outerwear
- Osprey | backpacks
- Outdoor Research | camping gear, apparel, outerwear
- Patagonia | backpacks, clothes, outerwear
